p: The micrographs of the peduncles, rays, pedicels, and fruits of Z. absinthifolia were obtained from alcohol samples utilizing light microcopy ( Figure 5, Figure 6, Figure 7 and Figure 8) and from the dried samples through Scanning Electron Microscopy (SEM, Jeol JSM 6490LV) ( Figure 9aâ€“k). The number of secretory canals in the centre was less than in the cortex at the peduncle. At the ray and pedicel secretory canals were only found in the cortex and the number of canals are higher. The secretory canals in fruit were very large and wide.
